name: ATTACKxREPEL
description:
Come forth into the electronic dungeon of ATTACKxREPEL, a magnetically-charged turn-based card battle game, made for the Game Maker Community Tangy Jam 44!

Designed around the theme of “Magnetism,” you control the polarity of battle, choosing which enemies to engage with and which to push away. Flip the Mag-Switch to repel one opponent while drawing another one close! 

Strategize to beat enemy defenses, discard weak or corrupted cards, and watch your dang HP as you progress from room-to-room to defeat each pair of enemies! Grow your deck along the way by beating baddies and swinging by the Card Shop between fights.

Featuring 5 dungeon rooms, 10 killer enemies, 12 Specialty Cards, and a few sweet surprises along the way!

Made in only 4 days (with a little touch-up to sweet away the bugs, obvs)

Game Design / Programming:    speedchuck

Art Lead:    blacktomjones

Music:    Frankumjay Sounds
